class.name: Tooltip Calibration
class.description: A Python GUI plugin to calibrate the tooltip position in end effector frame

qtgui.label: Agimus tooltip calibration
qtgui.statustip: Open a GUI to calibrate the tooltip.

class.name: Contact Calibration
class.description: A Python GUI plugin to trigger signal that allow to release contact

qtgui.label: Agimus contact calibration
qtgui.statustip: Open a GUI to calibrate by contact with planes.
